goal.ch:
The purpose of MM (Material Management) lab is to provide students with an understanding of the business processes related to material replenishment between a company and its upstream suppliers, and how to manage materials. .
MM實習課程內容之目的，旨在提供同學瞭解一間公司與其上游供應者間之進貨等相關之業務往來有關流程，以及瞭解如何對物料進行管理。
The purpose of the SD lab is to provide students with an understanding of a company‘s sales and distribution process. This lab will use the SAP ERP at our school‘s ERP center as the platform.
SD實習課程內容之目的，旨在提供同學瞭解一間公司有關銷售與配銷流程。兩實習課皆以本校ERP中心之SAP ERP為實習之平台。
goal.en:
The purpose of MM (Material Management) lab is to provide students with an understanding of the business processes related to material replenishment between a company and its upstream suppliers, and how to manage materials. .
MM實習課程內容之目的，旨在提供同學瞭解一間公司與其上游供應者間之進貨等相關之業務往來有關流程，以及瞭解如何對物料進行管理。
The purpose of the SD lab is to provide students with an understanding of a company‘s sales and distribution process. This lab will use the SAP ERP at our school‘s ERP center as the platform.
SD實習課程內容之目的，旨在提供同學瞭解一間公司有關銷售與配銷流程。兩實習課皆以本校ERP中心之SAP ERP為實習之平台。
